title: REDUCED - F/S - T205 Barger (Partial "B") - PSA 4 VGEX (MC)

posts.post_title: REDUCED - F/S - T205 Barger (Partial "B") - PSA 4 VGEX (MC)
posts.post_content:
I have a T205 E.B. Barger (Partial "B" on Cap) with Polar Bear reverse for sale.  Card is graded PSA 4 VGEX (MC) since the reverse is mis-cut.  Asking $115 shipped.  Last VGEX (SGC) on ebay sold for $185.  Paypal (friends / Family), money orders and checks accepted.  Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].  

Thanks!

Kevin
